function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 in the built environment","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, high mortality rates","Mitigation":"Enforce strict lockdown measures, promote vaccination, implement contact tracing and testing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits, healthcare analytics platforms","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Economic downturn and recession due to COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Decline in economic growth, rising unemployment, decreased consumer and business confidence","Mitigation":"Provide financial support to businesses and individuals, stimulate economic activity through fiscal policies, promote international trade","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, financial aid platforms, trade facilitation systems","People":"Business owners, employees, consumers","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","Impact":"Decreased investment, need for foreign finance, credibility issues","Mitigation":"Strengthen monetary policy, promote transparency in economic decision-making, attract foreign investment","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent transactions, financial forecasting tools, investment promotion platforms","People":"Investors, financial institutions, government","Owner":"Central bank, government"}]}
